name: football-pickem
description: Football Pickem League - Full Stack Application

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/dist backend/node_modules frontend/dist frontend/node_modules node_modules
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && cd backend && npm run setup
